original_text: And Asa slept with his fathers, and was buried with his fathers in the city of David his father: and Jehoshaphat his son reigned in his stead.
korean_text: 아사가 그의 조상들과 함께 자매 그의 조상들과 함께 그의 조상 다윗의 성읍에 장사되고 그의 아들 여호사밧이 대신하여 왕이 되니라

sentences.original_text: And Asa slept with his fathers,
and was buried with his fathers
in the city of David his father:
and Jehoshaphat his son reigned in his stead.
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 아들 여호사밧이 그의 자리를 이어 왕이 되었다.
